caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. CHRISTOPHER J. MARCHAND,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.

opinion.posture: No. 409 WAL 2003, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 11th day of December, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
